snippet.title: Clandestine Official Game Launch Trailer [on PC 1080p]
snippet.description:
We hope you enjoyed our Retro trailer!

Clandestine is a 2-player or singleplayer stealth/hacking video game set in 1996. When playing with 2 players, asymmetrical co-op allows one player to take the role of the spy while a friend provides overwatch and assistance as the hacker, and unravel a post-Cold War espionage conspiracy.

Store Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/290530/

Get in touch with us:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LogicArtists 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/logicartists

Learn more about Logic Artists at:

http://www.logicartists.com/logicarti...
